participant_1.background:
I enjoy cooking ethnic foods and listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers.
I watched a lot of sports last year and kept my home clean and tidy.
i m learning to play the guitar.
I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.
i speak fluent german.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes feel like my pets are the only ones who truly understand me.
I recently enjoyed a wine tour with my friends.
I love being in nature, which helps me clear my mind and relax after a long day of gaming.
if things are not done right i will redo them again and again.
sometimes i feel like i have already been through life once before.

content.text: Hi! What are your hobbies?
Hello! I love spending time in nature. I feel like it's the only place where I can truly relax.
Me too! I love going on bike rides and listening to music.
That sounds amazing! I love music, too. I recently went on a wine tour with my friends, and it was so much fun!
That sounds like a great time! I've never been on a wine tour before.
It was so much fun! We got to learn about different types of wine, and we got to taste a bunch of different ones.
That sounds so interesting! I'm definitely going to have to go on a wine tour someday.
You should! It's a great way to relax and have some fun with friends.
What's your favorite type of music?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm especially a fan of rock and roll.
Me too! I love the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
They're one of my favorite bands! I love their music.
Me too! They're so talented.
I'm glad you like them! They're one of the best bands out there.
I agree! They're definitely one of my favorites.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
I agree! It's nice to have someone to talk to about music.
Me too! I love talking about music.
I'm glad we can talk about it!
